p.k: Comedy, Drama Serbia (2017). Hrají: Gorica Popovic, Milica Spasojevic, Slobodan Custic. Režie: Marko Kostic.
p.d: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.
